settings.richtext:
Epny Golf will gladly accept returns or exchanges of any non custom-embroidered items purchased from bdraddy.com for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. 

Epny Golf cannot accept any returns or exchanges on international orders, including orders to Canada.

Please visit our Returns Page to obtain a return shipping label.

Epny Golf cannot accept any returns on boxers.

If you're unsure of your size or the fit of a garment, please reach out to our customer care team here or call 1-833-993-5473

Epny Golf cannot accept any returns or exchanges from other vendors who sell our product third party.

settings.title: Contact us
settings.des: For additional questions relating to Epny Golf's return or exchange policies please reach out to our customer service team
